name: Kill All Magical Girls
description:
This game was made for the: Magical Girl Game Jam, I did it when there was about 3 days left in the time-limit. Thus the game isn't very complete, I'll be updating this game on/off until I'm happy with it. But for now this is all I have done.

You can play all the waves and complete a run, but it's missing 3 bosses, two cutscenes, and some other things. I just didn't have the time to add them during the short development cycle due to computer troubles.

So, until the game is complete in a few days... enjoy.
